archimate:Facility.name: Facility
archimate:Facility.documentation: Plant :medcine manufacturing facility:-this facility shall have a number of equipments e.g. PAP01, RBS02, PLC OPC UA, Sealing station, Weighing Module, Fill Station, Bottle Singulation, Labeller, Capsule Fill etc... Each equiment with attached sensor will generates sensor data payload which is stored and published to the event broker.
